about_the_game:
Only stage 1 is playable in the demo version.
-----------------------------------------------
Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum?
Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll！

Aim for the goal with simple actions.
There are various challenging sections in the game, such as winding paths and steep slopes.
Use your concentration, reflexes, and unbreakable heart to keep the drum rolling and beat your personal best time.

To clear the game.

The game is cleared when the drum can is placed upright in the white luminous circle within the time limit!


If the time limit is unceremoniously exceeded, the drum will explode.
In addition, there is a self-destruct command, so you can always reset it by self-destructing if you think you cannot reach the goal!


Main Features.
・There are five outdoor stages in total, which may make you feel like a little traveler!
・Simple action of rolling weakly and rolling strongly
・Sparks fly out when the drum makes contact with the ground while it is spinning at high speed

Gaming Manta permits monetization of this game through video and live streaming.
